Text: I have no idea what this is supposed to be... Is it Quake-skins? For Q1, Q2, Q3 or Q4?

It's just plain old Quake1
Including GLQuake and Quakeworld i think, im no expert in Quake 1...

Absolutely no reason whatsoever that this release should be placed in the porn section... nothing even remotely sexy about it.

A. its in the Games section, it comes up in the searchs because i used naked as the description for quake, i should have named it bare bones, quake, but then people would have asked if it was just skeleton models.
Can't you Admins move it to the right secton?
